notes.text: We now show a generic delete failure message only if multiple contexts have been selected for deletion
We've resolved an issue where objects containing special characters in their names could not be deleted
We now show a generic message when the item deletion fails in various scenarios
We now support Core.AlternateKeys to allow app developers to force the fetching of alternate properties when loading an object page
We've now increased the default column size in forms for medium and large size screens
We've resolved an issue within the flexible column layout that occurs when Edit is clicked for non-draft entities on the right panel
The editFlow.editDocument method now returns a rejected promise in case of an error
We now ensure that the override execution of the onPageReady method is reverted from AfterAsync to After
We've resolved an issue that prevented the Delete button from triggering any deletion from an object page without a header's title
We've resolved an issue where a navigation to an empty draft entity was triggered just after the creation of a new entity
We've improved our documentation for the controller extensions
We now ensure that the Share: Microsoft Teams functionality works correctly in our building blocks
Wrapping the content of custom columns now works correctly when exporting
The paste feature with hidden properties used as the description now works correctly
We've resolved an issue where fields were not shown if a maximum annotation or a minimum annotation was used but no date annotation was used in validation
Columns with a specific scale for a given unit of measure are now correctly exported
We've resolved an issue with the outbound navigation for a contained entity
Custom filters now work correctly in the FilterBar building block
